mapper.select: select item.* from t_b_prescription_item item LEFT JOIN t_b_apply apply on item.applyid = apply.id where item.zyorderstatus = 0 AND item.paystatus =1 and apply.orgcode = #{orgCode} AND apply.status = 1

select t1.id as itemId, t1.orderid, t1.applyid, t1.drugname, t1.num, t1.retailprice, t1.fee, t1.manufacturername, t2.orderno, t2.drugfee ,t2.zyStoreId as storeId, t3.prescriptionno as prescriptionNo from t_zy_order_item t1 LEFT JOIN t_zy_order t2 on t1.orderid = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_b_prescription t3 on t1.applyid = t3.applyid where t1.removed = '0' and t2.removed = '0' and t2.orgcode = #{orgCode} and t2.paystatus = 0
and t2.id in (select id from t_zy_order where orderno like concat('%', #{name} , '%') UNION ALL select td.id from t_zy_order_item tm LEFT JOIN t_zy_order td ON tm.orderid = td.id where tm.drugName like concat('%', #{name} , '%') and td.paystatus = 0)
ORDER BY t2.orderno desc

select t1.id as itemId, t1.orderid, t1.drugname, t1.num,t1.receivenum, t1.retailprice, t1.fee, t1.manufacturername, t2.orderno, t2.expressno, t2.submittime, t2.recepitstatus, t3.prescriptionno as prescriptionNo, t4.patientname from t_zy_order_item t1 LEFT JOIN t_zy_order t2 on t1.orderid = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_b_prescription t3 on t1.applyid = t3.applyid LEFT JOIN t_b_patient_item t4 on t3.patientid = t4.id where t1.removed = '0' and t1.removed = '0' and t2.orgcode = #{orgCode} and t2.paystatus = 2
and (t2.orderno like concat('%', #{mo.name} , '%') OR t2.expressno like concat('%', #{mo.name} , '%'))
and t2.submittime >= #{mo.startTime}
and t2.submittime <= #{mo.endTime}
and t2.recepitstatus =1
and t2.recepitstatus !=1
ORDER BY
field(recepitstatus,0,2,-1),
t2.orderno desc
